decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( CC/FAL/SLP, 5692/04 and 5692/11 received on 4 May 2016 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - 3.	The mezzanine floor hereby approved shall only be used as a pet care, grooming, treatment facility and retail sales (use class sui generis) ancillary to the ground floor retail use for the sale of pet products and not operate as an independent use or outside the opening hours of the retail store. Upon cessation of the Sui Generis use, the floor space shall revert to retail floor space used in conjunction with the ground floor unit and shall not be used as an independent retail unit.
description: Installation of a mezzanine floor to be used for retail and a pet care treatment and grooming facility
